Name: Gladiator
Details: EXPERTISE: Guts A resilient fighter with crippling Melee attacks via Juggernaut and improved handling of Heat generation. Capable of standing their ground more effectively through Bulwark and able to suffer additional injuries before being incapacitated. Can also better control recoil effects from weapons. SPECIALIZATION: Gunnery Adept at the use of ranged weaponry in combat and able to tackle multiple opponents at once via Multi-Target.
